title: Celebrating Love
description: Celebrating Love' is a companion edition to 'Celebrating Silence' and collects excerpts from talks gives by Sri Sri Ravi Shankar in the years of 2001 and 2002 along with some notes that had been left out of 'Celebrating Silence'. Like 'Celebrating Silence', this book is also thematic in preference to being chronological. In this book one will find guidance on dealing with violence, fear and anger, and education on how to transform these negative emotions into healthy relationships and spirituality. These short discourses trigger insights and open ones mind to beauty and lifes mysteries. Authors perspective on dispassion, service, spirituality and God are unique and powerful. In essence these words will set one free! This book is specially compiled to help readers going through an emotional phase or who need a guidance in life. The reader can go through any one random page for help or can follow as per ones discretion. This book also comes with a CD.
author: Ravi     Shankar
